pr_title: Add legacy jdbc profile, to be able to analyse jdbc driver problems

timeline.message: Add legacy jdbc profile, to be able to analyse jdbc driver problems

timeline.bodyText: Gaarne de jar in onze nexus plaatsen ipv een jip en janneke repo uit China
timeline.author: nielsm5
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -25,6 +26,24 @@
 		<postgresql.driver.version>42.2.16</postgresql.driver.version>
 	</properties>
 
+	<profiles>
+		<profile>
+			<id>legacy-jdbc</id>
+			<repositories>
+				<repository> <!-- repository for oracle ojdbc7-12.1.0.2, that is used by NN -->
+					<id>hand-china-repo</id>
+					<name>HandChinaRepo</name>
+					<url>http://nexus.saas.hand-china.com/content/repositories/rdc/</url>
+				</repository>
+			</repositories>
+			<properties>
+				<oracle.driver.groupid>com.oracle</oracle.driver.groupid>
+				<oracle.driver.version>12.1.0.2</oracle.driver.version>
+				<oracle.driver.jdkversion>7</oracle.driver.jdkversion>
+			</properties>
+		</profile>
+	</profiles>
+

timeline.message: use ibissource nexus for legacy oracle jdbc driver
